Reviews.Title: “Pet friendly value hotel.”
Reviews.Author: johnnyhotcakes
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the drury inn because we were traveling with our puppy. I was excited that there was a popcorn machine in the breakfast area. The inn was clean and you could tell that the guests really enjoyed the hotel. Drury hotels are pet friendly and the staff was helpful and friendly. Looking forward to coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Never disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: jhb9383
Reviews.Content: The Drury Inns are consistently well run, welcoming, reasonably priced, and have tasty treats. We always look for them when available. The one in Campaign is a great example....and they take pets at NO extra charge!

Reviews.Title: “College tour U of I”
Reviews.Author: Watercooled
Reviews.Content: Excellent value. This is a great place to stay if your traveling w the family. Kids & dogs welcome, nice cocktail hour, breakfast included, easy checkin/checkout. Late checkout no problems. Great spot for a short term stay and close to campus.

Reviews.Title: “No need to go out for supper!! Lots of great food available.”
Reviews.Author: coldfeet52
Reviews.Content: I love Drury Inn's free food in the evening. I have stayed at this hotel multiple times in the last few months. The food is always great and lots of it. There is no need to go out for supper when you can eat here for free - really! The rooms don't have the modern bedding or decor, but they are clean, quiet, and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Farewell to Champign Drury”
Reviews.Author: candyDanville
Reviews.Content: Our Large Family rented many suites every News Year Eve these past about 5 or so years and was so good to stay and be enjoying one another as we brought in the new year. After the 3rd year the pool was to cold and hotel not as well kept and progressively went down hill. We asked over and over for them to correct these probkems to no avail. So last year we again said this was there last chance, but thank God we meant it. This year we are going else where and do hope the Drury wakes up and becomes what they once were. We stay at other Drurys in other areas and they do not have these same issues.

Reviews.Title: “Attentive Staff”
Reviews.Author: Carla222
Reviews.Content: We had to travel on Thanksgiving Day due to a funeral. We spent the night at the Drury Inn and Suites in Champaign. The staff were attentive, even on a holiday I'm sure they rather have spent at home. The Kick-back Happy Hour was nice and we were grateful for the meal, considering everything else was closed due to the holiday. The room was clean and maintained. In the morning we had a lovely breakfast. All this and a caring staff, too.

Reviews.Title: “This place is GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: seashell3
Reviews.Content: We were in Champaign for a family reunion and a wedding. There were 5 adults and 3 kids. We had three rooms which were wonderful. The bathrooms were cleaner than some of the higher end places I've stayed. Their daily evening event is generous, both in liquor and in food. The breakfast was HUGE - everthing you could ask for, and all very delicious. The kids enjoyed the pool too. This hotel does it all and does it WELL!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: GrammaH
Reviews.Content: We always use Drury Hotels when we travel if possible! This one was clean and very quiet making for a great night's sleep! The staff was very helpful! We hope to stop here again when heading south!

Reviews.Title: “Drury Inn Stay”
Reviews.Author: halsey11
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at this Inn the week of October 26th. I have always found the Drury Inns to be great places to stay and this Inn was no exception. Clean rooms, great beds and an excellent breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “very clean hotel, friendly staff, we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: MKoch-touroperator
Reviews.Content: Our second time at this location; everything is clean, great location, very good snacks and breakfast. The staff here genuinely cares about the heart and soul of their property - from the way the towels are folded to the cleanliness of the breakfast-snack area. They also went out of their way once again to make our stay comfortable; my daughter left her favorite pillow behind - Angela tracked it down, and is mailing it to us today! Thank you, Drury Inn! You did it again! We'll be back! p.s. I book a lot of tour groups, and we use Drury Inns quite often at various locations- always a good experience! Martha Koch, Chicago area tour operator

Reviews.Title: “Preferred Hotel in Champaign Area”
Reviews.Author: SoILTraveler
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel several times over the past year. Check-in is always flawless. Hotel staff are always courteous and friendly. Manager on Duty during my last visit even came by our table during the 5:30 pm Kick-Back to ask how we were enjoying our stay. Her friendly face and pleasant personality were back behind the front desk at check-out the next morning. Drury Inn - Champaign offers free hot breakfast in the morning and free hot foods and cold beverages in the evening. Rooms are not overly extravagant; however, they are always clean and quiet. Conveniently located near restaurants, shopping and the Interstate.

Reviews.Title: “Very good experience”
Reviews.Author: roboird
Reviews.Content: The staff is just ridiculously friendly and helpful. There is all this free food you can eat in the evening and for breakfast that could make your meal if you are really tight on funds. Very fast internet. Quiet. Good beds.

Reviews.Title: “Very good, but starting to show it's age.”
Reviews.Author: Apey1000
Reviews.Content: I've always tried to stay at this property whenever I pass through Champaign. The breakfast is fabulous. The hotel is starting to show it's age now, and could use a good refreshing. The staff is always very friendly, and the rooms are clean.

Reviews.Title: “Just right!”
Reviews.Author: webmom2
Reviews.Content: We went to Champaign to attend a function at U of I. It was our first time at the Drury Inn. Check in was early, quick, and accommodating. I booked 2 rooms. My sister was joining me later with her family and dog. (Pets stay free!) She was also quickly given her keys upon arrival. No lines, no waiting! We enjoyed the free breakfast, 2 free drinks each in the evening and appetizers. What a deal! The location is excellent. About a 15 minute ride to the school, but close to many stores and restaurants. We ate at the Lone Star next to the Drury and really enjoyed our meal. The only draw back I could see was that the pool was small and just a few people (5) in it make it look crowded. Overall it was a pleasant stay and I will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, clean, convenient location”
Reviews.Author: gutman
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed here over Easter weekend. The hotel is in good condition and is a good value for any family or business travelers staying in Champaign. It's located right off of Interstate 74 near the mall and a lot of restaurants. If you need to go to the U of I campus, it's about a 10 minute drive. The rooms were well kept, clean and had flat screen TVs. The bathrooms had floor to ceiling ceramic tile. The room furniture was tasteful and in decent shape. The lobby was nice sized with a sitting area and two flat screen TVs. The hotel staff was friendly and professional. We also enjoyed the free drinks and food. You get up to 3 drinks per adult and free appetizers in the evening. The breakfast included fresh waffels, biscuits and gravy, cereal, etc. They even have free soda and popcorn throughout the day. The quality of this hotel is consistent with the other Drurys I've seen. They provide a decent hotel with clean rooms and free food at a reasonable price. There are some nicer hotels in town, but you may pay a lot more and still not get some of the extras. We paid $83 on an e-saver rate by calling their reservation line. That seemed to be a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best Drury”
Reviews.Author: rondot98
Reviews.Content: I frequently stay at Drury Hotels and this one was not one of the better ones I have stayed at. It is beginning to show some wear. The eating area was small and there was not room for everyone at the evening kick back. There were barking dogs and a lot of noise in the hallway in the evening. The location is good but the view from my room through a very small window was not very appealing.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: midwest2010
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I and my 9 year old Grandson stayed here Feb. 26, 2011 for one night, while attending a University of Illinois basketball game. My sister and her family also stayed at the same time. The kids really enjoyed the indoor / outdoor pool. (yes you could swim outside in Champaign, IL in the middle of winter) Hot tub was nice, wish it was a little warmer, though. Close to shopping and various restaurants. Breakfast was included, it was okay, could definitely improve on it. They have free snacks and drinks from 5:30 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. each evening. Everything looked good, however, our game was at 6:00p.m., so we were unable to partake. Free popcorn and soda from 3 - 10 p.m., which was nice. We would definitely stay here again. Within 15 minutes of U of I Assembly Hall.

Reviews.Title: “Do not miss! Worth staying and relaxing!”
Reviews.Author: omkarj
Reviews.Content: Plus: Location, food, staff, service, extras extras and many extras (yes! plenty of them), cleanliness, accessibility. Circuit-City, Target, Maijer, WallMart - all shopping places around. Few sports bar, fast food outlets nearby. Peaceful place. Free unlimited wi-fi access. Free Local calls. Free Long distance calls! Healthy breakfast, evening snacks, Free evening drinks (liquors/hard drinks inclusive), Free soda and pop-corn for around 8 hrs, swimming pool :) Minus: Well - nothing I could take a note of !

Reviews.Title: “Small, Clean No-Frills Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Baubau4
Reviews.Content: My husband was invited to speak at his alma mater, University of Illinois, so the kids and I came along for the trip and made a weekend out of it. We chose this hotel because it had a microwave and minifridge in the room, which we needed. Our room was on the small side, but adequate. The hotel was clean. The decor was nice, not outdated. One perk was the hotel's complimentary breakfast. We ate breakfast both days we were there. I was satisfied with my experience there and would go back.

Reviews.Title: “My Experience with Drury Inn & Suites Champaign”
Reviews.Author: Nitin1282
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is located at a very nice place. Very near to all the shopping archades. The food served is amazing. All the big stores in Champaign,IL are within 2-4miles range. Nice Restaurants next to hotel for change in taste:). Free Internet facility. This is a very-very nice Hotel to Stay in. I just loved staying there. The staff is very nicely behaved.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Kick-Back”
Reviews.Author: jamesm0m
Reviews.Content: We went to Champaign to look at U. of I. with our son. Brought the dog too. Front desk went nuts over her. Really nice staff, big suite, flatscreen tvs, and 5pm "Kick-Back" featuring free tailgate-style food. Free breakfasts, wi-fi, and long distance too. Great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, great accomendations.”
Reviews.Author: tvdavita
Reviews.Content: We were pleasantly surprised with the wonderful stay we had at this hotel. From the size of our suite, its layout, hearty breakfast and 5:30 complentary food and drinks, we had an exceptional stay. We stayed with another couple for a wedding and both couples plan to try to stay at this hotel in the future and were glad to see that there were many other locations. We can't say enough about the friendly and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “This old hotel & why I won't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: Goldenz
Reviews.Content: Cons: loud party that continued all night until the police came & then started up again when the police left; sticky floors and counters in the breakfast area & tables barely cleaned; inadequate staffing at night (1 desk clerk); housekeeping didn't supply pool towels at the opening time & took about 15 minutes to fill the rack. Guests allowing babies to use the pool & hot tub with no swim diapers. Guess what? the pool closed for emergency maintenance. The pool and hot tub are undersized for the hotel (4 people crowded the hot tub). The room sizes are either a king suite with a sleeper sofa or 2 full size beds. The sleeper sofa mattress was thin. Pros: Sheets & towels were spotless, room was immaculate and the bed comfortable. The day staff was great, including the manager, and attentive to my groups needs. My concerns were addressed well by the manager but I would not recommend staying here and plan on finding other accomodations on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Best experience ever”
Reviews.Author: VaibhavGupta
Reviews.Content: After my marriage, this was my first business trip to US. My wife accompanied me. We stayed at Drury Inn and Suites, Champaign. Rooms are excellent provided with LCD TV and Mini Bar. Pool is small but fun to jump in. Small gymnasium enough to let you burn excess calories which you put on with tasty breakfast :). I just love sausages and the biscuit-gravy combination served. Hotel also provides unlimited night talk and wi-fi internet access. Will recommend everyone to experience Drury.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for a stopover”
Reviews.Author: SoonerFamily
Reviews.Content: We bypassed cheaper lodgings and stayed at this Drury Inn because my 13-yr-old son had been so impressed with a new Drury we had stayed at in St. Louis last year. This hotel was older but still provided us with a clean and very comfortable room with nice amenities such as a large flat-screen TV, microfridge, and a recliner. The internet in the room was easy to access and worked well. Breakfast offered a nice variety of hot and cold items. Front-desk staff were friendly and helpful. Overall it was a pleasant break from a long road trip.

Reviews.Title: “Champaign overnight, this place is a must”
Reviews.Author: argonauts52
Reviews.Content: Best hotel in champaign. Great breakfasts. Free drinks and popcorn in afternoon. I stay here for home football games. Nice indoor/outdoor pool. Highly recommended. Free internet and free parking. Huge rooms. Comfy beds. Couldn't ask for anymore. Tons of restaurants and shopping in the area. Price is always reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Good Location”
Reviews.Author: arabhammerhead
Reviews.Content: Clean, roomy, cosy, nice, above all, good value for money . Cocktail hour is great everyday after work. Reasonable breakfast. Not much to do in Champaign other than visit restaurants - it does have the highest ratio of restaurants to residents in the US. So having the wi-fi is all the more important!

Reviews.Title: “My Experience in Drury Inn and Suits,Champaign”
Reviews.Author: PuneDev
Reviews.Content: It was my third trip to Champaign and same way third time to Drury. It was a bussiness trip so accomodation arrangement made by my company itself. Though we have an option to change the hotel of our own choice I didn't go for it as Drury is one of the best hotel in Champaign. The other reason was most of my companymates from India use to stay there so it is very common to get a friend there. Here are my experiences in points. Pros: -Complimentary breakfast -Free 1 hour long distance calls, 15 minutes call for Canada everyday. -Nice Plazma tv in hotel room, Microwave -Nice location all places which are good are near like university and other discs -Room service is quite regular and they are quite co-operative -Cold drinks are available most of the time -Snakes,Beverages in the evening which include two hard drinks(though we couldn't enjoy that much because of office timings) -Drury membership, That is the most interesting part of Drury you get some points for each stay. As we have to stay longer for out official work we get enough points in one month that we can redeem it to 50 dollar amazon coupon. So it is kind of gift from Drury to you . Cons: -There is not much choice in morning breakfast and they are repeating same things from years so after few visits you will get bored with that atleast. -Sometimes power cut off while you are using microwave so it was pain in my last trip -In my first trip they accidently charged on my credit card for room payment without my approval. Though they revert the charge back but I got charge for both as I was having an Indian credit card. I noticed it later and then raise it to hotel staff and thanks to the hotel staff I got my 4000 INR back. I guess I was just unfortunate for this event because otehr two times it went very well. Over all I am quite satisfied with drury and its service if we ignore the breakfast part and I guess it will be good place to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “It's gone to the dogs”
Reviews.Author: JMNMom
Reviews.Content: We used to stay at this hotel every year when we drove south. Not anymore. When we were there last, there were dogs everywhere: pool area, even sitting up ON the tables in the dining area in the evening in clear view of the front desk. The whole place smelled. (I'm not anti-dog. We had dogs for years, but with so many dogs you have to work hard at being clean.) One of my kids is allergic and we were not able to request a "no dog" room. When I spoke to the 3 people at the desk, they just shrugged their shoulders. Good place if traveling with pets. We'll stay somewhere else from now on.

Reviews.Title: “It's Drury Inn for me”
Reviews.Author: StayAtDrury
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at another hotel on S. Neil, and was sickened the filth and rudeness. I quickly moved to the Drury Inn and what a difference. The Drury staff was extremely pleasant and helpful, my room was spotless and well kept. From now on It's the Drury Inn for me!! I am telling all my friends!

Reviews.Title: “Really nice staff, great value”
Reviews.Author: jen4ay
Reviews.Content: i had a great experience at the Drury Inn and Suites in Champaign. I was visiting the University of Illinois, and booked this hotel because it seemed close enough to everything I wanted to see, I thought the staff was friendly and helpful (they told me good restaurants to go to, plus directions!) and the best part was the breakfast! This isn't continental breakfast, but a full breakfast! We probably saved $10 per person just having a delicious breakfast at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay, Lots of Extras!!!”
Reviews.Author: rjhoffman
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel after searching on the internet for a place to stay in Champaign, Illinois. The rates were by far the best than any other hotel in town (we got the e-saver rate, better rate than AAA. You can still get it by calling directly to the hotel, just ask for that rate). We arrived about 5 p.m. and got checked in right away. You get a ticket for 3 "adult" beverages during "happy hour". We enjoyed our complimentary drinks while we waited for the rest of our group to arrive. By the way, they also have complementary soft drinks and popcorn. Included with "happy hour" are chips & salsa, carrot sticks and dip and, pretzels. Our room was very nice and clean. There are flat screen tv's in every room which the kids enjoyed when they weren't swimming. The pool is a nice size and it is an indoor/outdoor pool, which means half is inside and half is outside. The kids love that during the cool weather and the pool is nice and warm. The only downside was that it had rained quite a bit that day and there was thunder and lightening, so they had to close the pool as a safety precaution until the storm passed. But it did reopen. The beds were so comfortable that I was going to check and see what kind of mattress they used, but I forgot. Very quiet during the night too. Water pressure in the showers was really good considering everyone is using water efficient shower heads these days. Finally, the breakfast. This is INCLUDED in the price of the room. It is a FULL BREAKFAST...biscuits and gravy, eggs (with crumbled bacon, cheese and salsa on the side), sausage, french toast, made to order waffles, cereal, doughnuts, bagels, fruit, juices, coffee, milk. That alone saved us at lest $25 - $30 if we had gone out to breakfast with the kids. If you want a great room, with comfortable beds, super friendly staff and LOTS of extras (comp mixed drinks/beer, comp soft drinks and popcorn, full breakfast in the morning) then this is the place for you. If you want less, then go somewhere else. I will seek out Drury Inn's in our future travels. A GREAT VALUE DURING A TIME WHEN EVERYONE IS TRYING TO CUT BACK. THEY CARE ABOUT THEIR CUSTOMERS!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is nice ..but..”
Reviews.Author: gidget&rocky
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a pretty good experiance. The rooms were clean and the remainder of the hotel appeared in the same condition. One thing that stood out was the staff was very friendly. Everyone greeted us with a smile and hello. We arrived a little before check-in and our room was ready. They had popcorn and soft drinks avaiable but we were going to meet our son for wings at Wild Wings about 1-2 blocks away for a light lunch so we passed. We returned a little later and enjoyed a few cocktails in the lobby before heading off to the pool and jucuzzi for about 1 hr. They allow 3 per guest per evening and is a very nice perk. Drinks were very weak but what can you expect. We went out for dinner and returned about 10pm. The one thing I really like is the security in this hotel. When they say the lock the outside doors they REALLY DO. You need your key to get in any exterior door. Very impressive. Many hotels say this and never follow through. OK..besides all of that the ONE THING I DID NOT LIKE WAS....we had a room on the east side and in the corner. Now for those of you who have never been to this area BEWARE...the Drury Inn is located by THE BUSIEST intersection in Champaign. The traffic noise in the early morning hours litterally woke me up in the morning.....The trucks braking, loud muffler sounds echoed...If you book a room here, make sure to book on the East side and hopeully you won't have that issue. I enjoyed my stay as the room was clean BUT I doubt if I will ever stay at this particular location again. Also, we checked out at 10:45am ( check out is 11am) and I felt that we were being rushed. The cleaning people were next door and made us VERY well aware that they were there. It's a good thing I didn't need the extra sleep as I would not have gotten it.

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievably nice!!! Excellent, excellent stay.”
Reviews.Author: CollegeShopper
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable!! This place is so nice, staff so amazingingly nice and competent. This is our new choice for hotels! We will search out a Drury Inn over the "other 4 and 5 star hotels" everytime we travel. This was clean, (an understatement I might add), safe, quiet, very, very nice. The breakfast in the morning was not your doughnut and coffee but a FULL service Breakfast Buffet with everything from bisquits and gravy to made to order Waffles! Wonderful, wonderful experience. Wonderful hotel in a wonderful location. Cannot say enough good things about this place. For all you parents out college shopping, STAY HERE!!! It might even remind your student/child what a "clean room" is supposed to look like! You will be very plesantly surprised!

Reviews.Title: “Sparkling Clean”
Reviews.Author: JWashingtonDC
Reviews.Content: This was my first time staying at a Drury hotel and I will definitely be a returning customer. It is one of the cleanest (if not THE cleanest) hotel room I have ever stayed in. I literally stopped in my tracks upon entering the bathroom because I could not believe how sparkling clean it was. That is so rare for a hotel chain these days. The rooms have unusual decor, reminding me of Kentucky for some reason. It wasn't unpleasant, just midwestern, I guess. The rooms have mini fridges and microwaves and the mattresses & pillows are soft and very comfy. The rooms must be well insulated because I could not hear anything outside or my neighbors, despite the hotel being near capacity. Free hot breakfast is provided which included eggs, sausage, make-your-own-waffles, muffins, cereal, yogurt, coffee, and assorted juices. A free 1 hour long distance phone call is included with each room. I believe that there is also free internet access and a computer w/ internet is provided in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for two nights. The staff was very friendly and helpful, answering all of our questions. The room was very clean and pleasant. Free high speed internet was nice. Great location - close to the highway as well as downtown Champaign. I would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Drury Inn”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It was a pleasure to stay in the Drury. I stayed in the Hawthorn for 2 weeks while on business in Champaign. Staff was very friendly , and response time was excelent. When I left th hotel I forgot my cellphone charger. They sent it my mail to me free of charge. Recomended

HotelInfo.Name: Drury Inn & Suites Champaign
HotelInfo.Address: 905 W Anthony Dr, Champaign, IL 61821
